name: JPAT - Java Protein Analysis Tools
short_description: The JPAT API is a Java API designed to provide developers with tools for calculating the results of protease digestion of proteins and ms/ms fragmentation of peptides. JPAT also contains GUI components for displaying the results. JPAT is a nice way to get
